external_games.name: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom!

franchises.name: My Next Life as a Villainess

name: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom!
storyline:
A game that's much more than just following the story of the TV anime!
What if Catarina had taken a different route?
Is Catarina able to avoid destruction and reach happiness?
Everything is up to you!
Enjoy creating the path of Catarina's fate!
summary: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! ~comes to StoryMe!~ is a collaboration between ASMIK ACE and StoryMe, released in April 5, 2020 for Android and IOS platforms. The game officially received an English release for the world-wide version of the StoryMe app on Sept. 16, 2020. Each episode of the game was released alongside the animation broadcast. It has 19 episodes, with the first 12 being a retelling of the anime's story, and the last few being the respective 7 endings of the capture targets.
